channel.title: [317] Npc Dialog Help
channel.description:
Hello, i was just woundering how do i make a npc continue saying something, for exsample:: MAN: hello welcome to this server! (hit continue) i like this server!
now how do i make it so when the player hits continue the npc says more things? i know how to make them say stuff just not how to continue on to another thing.

item.title: [317] Npc Dialog Help
item.dc:creator: @rangergodlv rangergodlv
item.description:
@rangergodlv wrote:

thats what ive been useing, but thats for only one page, i need to know how to connect two or mre of them, but thanks for takeing the time todo that

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Npc Dialog Help
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

i dont know if it can help you but i found this npc talking code in client.java:

if(NPCID == 1859) { sendFrame200(4901, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(1859), 4902); sendFrame126("Welcome to the avatar minigame", 4903); sendFrame126("Kill the avatars until you get a bronze key", 4904); sendFrame126("If you happen to get one, click on the chest to open it", 4905); sendFrame126("Good luck stranger.", 4906); sendFrame75(1859, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

Read full topic
